page.title: 04Newtown Market
page.content: Tuesday and Saturdays are market days in Newtown.One Tuesday we undertook a survey of the market stalls.Most of the stalls were located in Broad Street and High Street,and in the indoor market building.All the stalls in the indoor market are occupied by local traders.The stall holders in Broad Street and High Street travel to Newtown from Welshpool,Shrewsbury, Oswestry and Liverpool.The stall holders are ready to commence business at approxinately 8.30 a.m.Trading ceases between 4.30 and 5.00.When we undertook the survey there were eighty five stalls in the Market.They included boots and shoes,electrical goods,clothing,household goods,fresh fruit and vegetables,toys,gardening equipment,plants,bicycles,crockery, oriental goods,books,fish meat,dairy produce,antiquies.
